member.name: T:HashTools.FileHashTools
member.summary: Functions to work with file hashes

member.name: M:HashTools.FileHashTools.GetFileHash(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Returns the Hash-Value of a given file.
member.param:
Valid arguments:
MD5
RIPEMD160
SHA1
SHA256
SHA384
SHA512

member.name: M:HashTools.FileHashTools.CompareHash(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Checks if a given file has a given hash.
member.param:
Valid arguments:
MD5
RIPEMD160
SHA1
SHA256
SHA384
SHA512
